sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Form, Dropdown, Button, Grid    } from 'semantic-ui-react';


/* this will need to be a list of times */

const optionsDuration = [
    { key: 5, text: '5', value: 5 },
    { key: 10, text: '10', value: 10 },
    { key: 15, text: '15', value: 15 },
    { key: 20, text: '20', value: 20 },
    { key: 25, text: '25', value: 25 },
  ]

const optionsHours = [
    { key: 100, text: '100', value: 100 },
    { key: 200, text: '200', value: 200 },
    { key: 300, text: '300', value: 300 },
    { key: 400, text: '400', value: 400 },
  ]
  


class BabyInput extends React.Component {
    state = {}

    handleChange = (e, { value }) => this.setState({ value })

    render() {
        
        const { value } = this.state
        
        return (

            <Grid columns={2} divided>
                <Grid.Row>
                    <Grid.Column>
                        
                    </Grid.Column>
                    <Grid.Column>
                    <Form>
                <Form.Group>
                <Button compact>Right</Button>
                <Button compact>Left</Button>
                    <Form.Field>
                        <label>Duration</label>
                        <Dropdown
                            search
                            searchInput={{ type: 'number' }}
                            selection
                            options={optionsDuration}
                            
                            placeholder='Select amount...'
                        />
                    </Form.Field>
                    <Form.Field>
                        <label>Time of the day</label>
                        <Dropdown
                            search
                            searchInput={{ type: 'number' }}
                            selection
                            options={optionsHours}
                            placeholder='Select amount...'
                        />
                    </Form.Field>
                   </Form.Group>
               
             
                <Form.TextArea placeholder='The place where you keep your notes...' />
                <Form.Button>Save</Form.Button>
            </Form>
                    
                    </Grid.Column>
                    
                </Grid.Row>

                <Grid.Row>
                    <Grid.Column>
                        
                    </Grid.Column>
                    <Grid.Column>
                       
                    </Grid.Column>
                    
                </Grid.Row>
            </Grid>
              
        )
    }
}

export default BabyInput;
